title: The End of the PS4 Begins - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.05.21
description:
Go to http://expressvpn.com/games to get 3 extra months for free!

Go to http://amazon.com/GAMESRX to save on prescription medication and get FREE 2-day delivery!

Sony's discontinuing most of the PS4 models in Japan, so start the funeral! Plus, Nintendo buys the developer of Luigi's Mansion 3!
